name: College IO (Opoly)
description:
COLLEGE IO

College IO is a fun, fast, collegiate property trading game that celebrates the college life. Play against your friend, friends, or AI (Artificial Intelligence). Spin, buy, and sell as you race around the College IO board. Every time you buy the same color board spaces you achieve College IO. The richest player wins the game!

Optional Game Features
* Change names
* Leader boards
